lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Jornal do Brasil newspaper, in an editorial today entitled "Dangerous Confrontation," said: "From the economic point of view the seamen's strike carries an alarming cost, with grave consequences for the supply situation and for the country's external trade."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But a senior official of the National Merchant Marine Union, Jorge Luis Leao Franco, told Reuters that the strike would continue regardless of the tribunal's ruling.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: On February 20 the Brazilian government suspended interest payments on part of its huge foreign debt following a sharp deterioration in its trade balance.
